name: Geronimo
short_description:
A set of bash scripts to automate the installation of Arch Linux, following the Arch Beginner's Installation Guide and kept as simple as possible.

It installs Arch Linux to a root filesystem with 1 swap partition, and uses grub2 as the bootloader on a master boot record.

No support for advanced options like gpt, uefi, syslinux etc.
_____________________________________

Boot archiso, install git.

Run 'git clone git://git.code.sf.net/p/arch-geronimo/code arch-geronimo-code'

'cd arch-geronimo-code'

Then 'chmod +x geronimo.sh' and './gerinimo.sh'
summary: Stupidly simple and fast Arch Linux install scripts
